publication.title: Towards computational polar-topotronics: multiscale neural-network quantum molecular dynamics simulations of polar vortex states in SrTiO3/PbTiO3 nanowires
publication.author: T. Linker, S. Fukshima, R. K. Kalia, A. Krishnamoorthy, A. Nakano, K. Nomura, K. Shimamura, F. Shimojo, and P. Vashishta
